phenoscope.util#

Submodules#

phenoscope.util.constants#

PhenoScope Constants

This module contains constant values and enumerations used throughout the PhenoScope library. Constants are organized by module and functionality.

Note: Class names are defined in ALL_CAPS to avoid namespace conflicts with actual classes in the codebase (e.g., GRID vs an actual Grid class). When importing, use the format:

from phenoscope.util.constants import IMAGE_FORMATS, OBJECT_INFO

class phenoscope.util.constants_.GRID[source]

Bases: object

Constants for grid structure in the PhenoScope module.

This class defines grid-related configurations, such as the number of rows and columns in the grid, intervals between these rows and columns, and grid section information like section number and index.

GRID_COL_INTERVAL = 'Grid_ColInterval'
GRID_COL_NUM = 'Grid_ColNum'
GRID_ROW_INTERVAL = 'Grid_RowInterval'
GRID_ROW_NUM = 'Grid_RowNum'
GRID_SECTION_IDX = 'Grid_SectionIndex'
GRID_SECTION_NUM = 'Grid_SectionNum'
class phenoscope.util.constants_.GRID_LINREG_STATS_EXTRACTOR[source]

Bases: object

Constants for grid linear regression statistics extractor.

COL_LINREG_B = 'ColLinReg_B'
COL_LINREG_M = 'ColLinReg_M'
PRED_CC = 'ColLinReg_PredCC'
PRED_RR = 'RowLinReg_PredRR'
RESIDUAL_ERR = 'LinReg_ResidualError'
ROW_LINREG_B = 'RowLinReg_B'
ROW_LINREG_M = 'RowLinReg_M'
class phenoscope.util.constants_.IMAGE_FORMATS[source]

Bases: object

Constants for supported image formats.

BGR = 'BGR'
BGRA = 'BGRA'
CHANNELS_DEFAULT = 3
DEFAULT_SCHEMA = 'RGB'
GRAYSCALE = 'Grayscale'
GRAYSCALE_SINGLE_CHANNEL = 'Grayscale (single channel)'
HSV = 'HSV'
MATRIX_FORMATS = ['Grayscale', 'Grayscale (single channel)']
RGB = 'RGB'
RGBA = 'RGBA'
RGBA_OR_BGRA = 'RGBA/BGRA (ambiguous)'
RGB_OR_BGR = 'RGB/BGR (ambiguous)'
SUPPORTED_FORMATS = ['RGB', 'RGBA', 'Grayscale', 'BGR', 'BGRA']
class phenoscope.util.constants_.METADATA_LABELS[source]

Bases: object

Constants for metadata labels.

IMAGE_NAME = 'ImageName'
PARENT_IMAGE_NAME = 'ParentImageName'
PARENT_UUID = 'ParentUUID'
SCHEMA = 'Schema'
UUID = 'UUID'
class phenoscope.util.constants_.OBJECT_INFO[source]

Bases: object

Constants for object information properties.

CENTER_CC = 'Bbox_CenterCC'
CENTER_RR = 'Bbox_CenterRR'
MAX_CC = 'Bbox_MaxCC'
MAX_RR = 'Bbox_MaxRR'
MIN_CC = 'Bbox_MinCC'
MIN_RR = 'Bbox_MinRR'
OBJECT_LABELS = 'ObjectLabel'

phenoscope.util.exceptions#

PhenoScope Exceptions

This module contains all exceptions used throughout the PhenoScope library. Exceptions are organized by module and functionality.

exception phenoscope.util.exceptions_.ArrayKeyValueShapeMismatchError[source]

Bases: ValueError

Exception raised when the shape of the value doesn’t match the key’s section.

add_note()

Exception.add_note(note) – add a note to the exception

with_traceback()

Exception.with_traceback(tb) – set self.__traceback__ to tb and return self.

args

exception phenoscope.util.exceptions_.UnsupportedSchemaError(schema)[source]

Bases: ValueError

Represents an error when an unsupported schema format is detected.

This error is raised when a specified schema format is not supported by the application or library that utilizes this exception class.

Parameters:

schema (str) – The schema format that triggered this exception.

add_note()

Exception.add_note(note) – add a note to the exception

with_traceback()
